definition: (idiom) to take on a leadership role at a time of crisis
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: However, stepped in, but also the leadership of reuse, cousin, or went.
sentences.chinese: 不過臨危受命，也是領導重用，表弟還是去了。

sentences.english: Several soldiers stepped in to ensure the young man's safety.
sentences.chinese: 幾個戰士臨危受命，以確保年輕人的安全。

sentences.english: In the spirit of the gift I take it.
sentences.chinese: 本着授權的這個精神，我臨危受命。
